DOC.brief_summary: This Phase III clinical trial examine efficacy , safety , tolerability addition MK-0431/ONO-5435 Japanese patient Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus inadequate glycemic control diet/exercise therapy insulin monotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: MK-0431/ONO-5435 Phase III Clinical Trial - Insulin Add-on Study Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Japanese Patients Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus inadequate glycemic control diet/exercise therapy insulin monotherapy Patients Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
